snippet: President Obama’s administration finally surrendered to a hostile district court judge and an appeals court that seemed to offer little hope of restricting access to the morning-after pill.
abstract: Pres Obama’s administration finally surrenders to hostile district court judge and appeals court that seem to offer little hope of restricting access to morning-after pill.

byline.contributor: Pam Belluck contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Obama’s administration finally surrendered to a hostile district court judge and an appeals court that seemed to offer little hope of restricting access to the morning-after pill.

headline.seo: Obama Waves White Flag in Contraceptive Battle
headline.main: Obama Waves White Flag in Contraceptive Battle
headline.print_headline: Obama Waves White Flag In Contraceptive Battle
